titles.title: To designate the visitor center at the Big Thicket National Preserve as the "Ralph W. Yarborough Visitor Center".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2043-2044)
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Designates the visitor center at the Big Thicket National Preserve located off U.S. Route 69 on FM 420 north of Kountze, Texas, as the Ralph W. Yarborough Visitor Center.
